Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication

Class AbstractSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.AbstractSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sender
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpSender, JmsSender, KafkaSender
    public abstract class AbstractSender
extends Object
implements Sender
    Superclass for all Senders. When writing your own Sender, extend this class and overwrite methods, when needed. All Sender will be automatically pooled by the SDK; you must not implement your own connection pooling!
    Version:
    4.0.6
    Author:
    hsiegeln

      • addExceptionListener

        public void addExceptionListener​(SenderExceptionListener exceptionListener)
        Set Exception listener with special handling on exceptions.
        Parameters:
        exceptionListener - the exception listener to add to list

      • startup

        public void startup()
        Triggers initial startup of this sender. I.e., the sender tries to connect, and, if not possible, triggers the reconnect loop.
        This should be called just once for initial connection. Subsequent connection attempts should use the reconnect(Exception) implementation.

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws NjamsSdkRuntimeException
        override this method to implement your own connection initialization
        Throws:
        NjamsSdkRuntimeException - NjamsSdkRuntimeException

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect​(Exception e)
        Initiates a reconnect thread if isConnected() is false and no other reconnect is currently running.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception that initiated the reconnect

      • doReconnect

        protected void doReconnect​(Exception ex)
        Implements reconnect behavior. Override this for your own reconnect handling
        Parameters:
        ex - the exception that initiated the reconnect

      • send

        public void send​(com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.common.CommonMessage msg,
                 String clientSessionId)
        Send the given message. This method automatically applies the discardPolicy onConnectionLoss, if set
        Specified by:
        send in interface Sender
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send
        clientSessionId - The session ID of the Njams instance that sends the message.

      • onException

        protected void onException​(Exception exception)
        used to implement your exception handling for this sender. Is called, if sending of a message fails. It will automatically close any try to reconnect the connection; override this method for your own handling
        Parameters:
        exception - NjamsSdkRuntimeException
